channel.title: How do i edit the menu when i logg in
channel.description: how do i edit the menu you see when you logg in? like to state rules and so forth

item.title: How do i edit the menu when i logg in
item.dc:creator: @spiritlord99 spiritlord99
item.description:
@spiritlord99 wrote:

on fr33sc4p3 it says “poke me to log” so if it said that on the logout button then what you would do is go into client.java and press ctrl+f and find “poke me to log” and then change it to what u want,

Read full topic

item.source: How do i edit the menu when i logg in

item.title: How do i edit the menu when i logg in
item.dc:creator: @daftcat daftcat
item.description:
@daftcat wrote:

Log onto your server and see what the opening menu says then you go to client.java and press ctrl + F or go to edit and find then type in one of the key words that were on the menu and change to your liking.

Example: the server is naturally called pk scape so search for pk scape in client.java and then change the title to what ever u want same goes with rules and log out button etc. etc.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i edit the menu when i logg in

item.title: How do i edit the menu when i logg in
item.dc:creator: @hmni hmni
item.description:
@hmni wrote:

go to “Client.Java” and press CTRL+F then type “Welcome to” and edit anything near there…

XD
